doc.name: input-file
doc.description:
Using WSForm to upload files

Make sure you have changed the appropriate local settings for file uploads. See the WSForm installation manual.
doc.parameters:
target* : Name of the File Upload Wiki Page

pagecontent* : Text content to be added on the File Page

presentor : If you have Slim uploader installed use : presentor="slim". More presenters are planned

force : When an image, force to certain format (png, jpg, gif)

error_id : Id of a DOM Element where error notices will be shown

verbose_id : Id of a DOM element where information about the file is shown

use_label : Doesn't require a value. When an input field has a label attached to it, the the label will become the upload button and the input field will be hidden

parsecontent: Will force WSForm to first parse the content through the Wiki Parser


* = a required variable
doc.example: <wsfield type="file" name="test" target="Test file" pagecontent="Information of the test file" error_id="div-error" verbose_id="div-verbose" />
